contents.text: Thank you for calling VMware South Bay, a global leader in cloud infrastructure and digital workspace technology.
For sales, licensing, and new deployments, press 1.
For VMware Cloud and cloud infrastructure sales, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our cloud infrastructure sales team.

navigationGoals: I need pricing and deployment options for a new VMware Cloud infrastructure setup.
I need to buy VMware cloud infrastructure to host a veteran community support portal.
Evaluate pricing and deployment options for a multi-region VMware Cloud on AWS cluster.
I want to speak with someone about purchasing and setting up VMware cloud infrastructure.
Inquire about academic cloud infrastructure offerings and pricing for student research

contents.text: For licensing inquiries and contract renewals, press 2.
Please hold to speak with our licensing and renewals specialist.

navigationGoals: I need to renew my VMware licensing contract and inquire about volume discounts.
I want to renew my organization’s VMware licenses for our veteran job training servers.
Renew our enterprise NSX licensing and confirm support coverage dates.
I need help renewing my VMware licensing contract and understanding the renewal terms.
Renew my VMware education license under the academic program

contents.text: For technical support and customer care, press 2.
For developer tools and API support, press 1.
Please hold to connect with our developer tools support team.

navigationGoals: I need help resolving an authentication error in my VMware API integration with our CI/CD pipeline.
I need help integrating VMware’s developer APIs for a custom resource scheduling tool for my veteran program.
Troubleshoot REST API authentication failures in my vCenter automation scripts.
I’d like assistance using VMware developer tools and integrating their APIs.
Get help integrating VMware developer APIs for my physics simulation project

contents.text: For digital workspace and end-user support, press 2.
Please hold to connect with our digital workspace support team.

navigationGoals: I need assistance troubleshooting login failures on our VMware digital workspace for end users.
I’m having trouble accessing my VMware virtual desktop setup for remote work after leaving the military.
Resolve end-user login errors in VMware Horizon and profile loading issues.
I need help configuring my VMware digital workspace to access my virtual desktop.
Troubleshoot access to my remote digital workspace for university lab work
